name: Maintenance Report
about: Report maintenance tasks or housekeeping items
title: "Maintenance: [Brief description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees:

---

## Maintenance Guidelines

### Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

### Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security patch
- [ ] Other (specify):

### Impact
Describe the impact of this maintenance task on the project (e.g., low, medium, high).

### Timeline
Proposed timeline for completing this maintenance task.

### Additional Context
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
